column4: hi, have a problem with the refresh rate of a monitor. have two monitors with radeon9500 card, right monitor has vertical 75Hz instead of 60 Hz and horizontally 93 instead of 75
anybody an idea`?
is it a dual monitor setup?
yes
but without xinerama
have you looked at xorg.conf?
yes, had trouble to get it working, now works, but with the prob
i know how to erit refresh on signle monitor system, not sure how different dual monitors is
oh ok
ok, can i send you my con?
conf
lmf can you do it in pastebin?
whats pastebin?
where does xchat save downloads, do you know?
desktop?
don't know
yeah desktop i found it :-)
are the monitors identical?
yes, two HP L2035 LCDs, but for one i used the DVI - in, with the other one the VGA - in
ok i was just noticing that your config in xorg.conf the 2 monitors have different settings for refresh rates
does either of thm work the way you want it?
thats because the vga-in has different values to the dvi -in
